extensions/emmet.emmetExtensionsPath: An array of paths, where each path can contain Emmet syntaxProfiles and/or snippet files. In case of conflicts, the profiles/snippets of later paths will override those of earlier paths. See https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/emmet for more information and an example snippet file.
extensions/emmet.emmetExtensionsPathItem: A đường dẫn containing Emmet syntaxProfiles and/or snippets.
extensions/emmet.emmetShowExpandedAbbrev: Shows expanded Emmet abbreviations as suggestions. The option `"inMarkupAndStylesheetFilesOnly"` applies to html, haml, jade, slim, xml, xsl, css, scss, sass, less and stylus. The option `"always"` applies to all parts of the file regardless of markup/css.

extensions/emmet.emmetPreferencesIntUnit: Mặc định unit cho integer giá trịs.
extensions/emmet.emmetPreferencesFloatUn: Mặc định unit cho float giá trịs.
extensions/emmet.emmetPreferencesCssAfte: Symbol đến be placed tại the end of CSS thuộc tính khi expanding CSS abbreviations.
extensions/emmet.emmetPreferencesSassAft: Symbol đến be placed tại the end of CSS thuộc tính khi expanding CSS abbreviations trong Sass files.
extensions/emmet.emmetPreferencesStylusA: Symbol đến be placed tại the end of CSS thuộc tính khi expanding CSS abbreviations trong Stylus files.

extensions/emmet.emmetPreferencesStylusB: Symbol đến be placed tại the between CSS thuộc tính và giá trị khi expanding CSS abbreviations trong Stylus files.
extensions/emmet.emmetShowSuggestionsAsS: If `true`, then Emmet suggestions will show up as snippets allowing you đến order them as per `#editor.snippetSuggestions#` cài đặt.
extensions/emmet.emmetPreferencesBemElem: Element separator used cho classes khi using the BEM filter.
extensions/emmet.emmetPreferencesBemModi: Modifier separator used cho classes khi using the BEM filter.

A definition of comment that should be placed after matched element khi comment filter is applied.

extensions/emmet.emmetPreferencesFormatN: An array of tag names that should never get inner indentation.
extensions/emmet.emmetPreferencesFormatF: An array of tag names that should always get inner indentation.
extensions/emmet.emmetPreferencesAllowCo: If `true`, compact notation of boolean attributes are produced.
extensions/emmet.emmetPreferencesCssWebk: Comma separated CSS thuộc tính that get the 'webkit' vendor prefix khi used trong Emmet abbreviation that starts với `-`. Set đến empty string đến always avoid the 'webkit' prefix.
extensions/emmet.emmetPreferencesCssMozP: Comma separated CSS thuộc tính that get the 'moz' vendor prefix khi used trong Emmet abbreviation that starts với `-`. Set đến empty string đến always avoid the 'moz' prefix.
extensions/emmet.emmetPreferencesCssOPro: Comma separated CSS thuộc tính that get the 'o' vendor prefix khi used trong Emmet abbreviation that starts với `-`. Set đến empty string đến always avoid the 'o' prefix.
extensions/emmet.emmetPreferencesCssMsPr: Comma separated CSS thuộc tính that get the 'ms' vendor prefix khi used trong Emmet abbreviation that starts với `-`. Set đến empty string đến always avoid the 'ms' prefix.
extensions/emmet.emmetPreferencesCssFuzz: The tối thiểu score (from 0 đến 1) that fuzzy-matched abbreviation should achieve. Lower giá trịs may produce many false-positive matches, higher giá trịs may reduce possible matches.
extensions/emmet.emmetOptimizeStylesheet: When set to `false`, the whole file is parsed to determine if current position is valid for expanding Emmet abbreviations. When set to `true`, only the content around the current position in CSS/SCSS/Less files is parsed.
extensions/emmet.emmetPreferencesOutputI: The số lượng sibling inline elements needed cho line breaks đến be placed between those elements. nếu `0`, inline elements are always expanded onto a single line.
extensions/emmet.emmetPreferencesOutputR: If `true`, reverses attribute merging directions khi resolving snippets.

extensions/git.config.autorefresh: Whether auto refreshing is đã bật.
extensions/git.config.autofetch: When set đến true, commits will tự độngally be fetched từ the mặc định remote of the current Git repository. cài đặt đến `all` will fetch từ all remotes.
extensions/git.config.autofetchPeriod: Duration trong seconds between each tự động git fetch, khi `#git.autofetch#` is đã bật.
extensions/git.config.countBadge: Điều khiển the Git count badge.
extensions/git.config.checkoutType: Điều khiển what type of Git refs are listed khi running `Checkout to...`.
extensions/git.config.defaultBranchName: The name of the default branch (example: main, trunk, development) when initializing a new Git repository. When set to empty, the default branch name configured in Git will be used. **Note:** Requires Git version `2.28.0` or later.
extensions/git.config.branchPrefix: Prefix used khi creating a new branch.
extensions/git.config.branchProtection: List of protected branches. By default, a prompt is shown before changes are committed to a protected branch. The prompt can be controlled using the `#git.branchProtectionPrompt#` setting.
extensions/git.config.branchProtectionPr: Điều khiển whether a nhắc nhở is being shown before changes are committed đến a protected branch.
Always commit changes đến the protected branch.
Always commit changes đến a new branch.
Always nhắc nhở before changes are committed đến a protected branch.
extensions/git.config.branchRandomNameDi: List of dictionaries used for the randomly generated branch name. Each value represents the dictionary used to generate the segment of the branch name. Supported dictionaries: `adjectives`, `animals`, `colors` and `numbers`.
extensions/git.config.branchRandomNameEn: Điều khiển whether a random name is generated khi creating a new branch.
extensions/git.config.branchValidationRe: A regular expression đến hợp lệate new branch names.
extensions/git.config.branchWhitespaceCh: The character đến replace whitespace trong new branch names, và đến separate segments of a randomly generated branch name.
extensions/git.config.ignoreLegacyWarnin: Ignores the legacy Git cảnh báo.
extensions/git.config.ignoreMissingGitWa: Ignores the cảnh báo khi Git is missing.
extensions/git.config.ignoreWindowsGit27: Ignores the cảnh báo khi Git 2.25 - 2.26 is installed trên Windows.
extensions/git.config.ignoreLimitWarning: Ignores the cảnh báo khi there are too many changes trong a repository.
extensions/git.config.ignoreRebaseWarnin: Ignores the cảnh báo khi it looks like the branch might have been rebased khi pulling.
extensions/git.config.defaultCloneDirect: The mặc định location đến clone a Git repository.
extensions/git.config.useEditorAsCommitI: Điều khiển whether a full text editor will be used đến author commit thông điệps, whenever no thông điệp is provided trong the commit input box.
extensions/git.config.verboseCommit: Enable verbose output khi `#git.useEditorAsCommitInput#` is đã bật.
extensions/git.config.enableSmartCommit: Commit all changes khi there are no staged changes.
extensions/git.config.smartCommitChanges: Control which changes are tự độngally staged bởi Smart Commit.
Tự độngally stage tracked changes only.
extensions/git.config.suggestSmartCommit: Suggests đến enable smart commit (commit all changes khi there are no staged changes).
extensions/git.config.enableCommitSignin: Cho phép commit signing với GPG, X.509, hoặc SSH.
extensions/git.config.discardAllScope: Controls what changes are discarded by the `Discard all changes` command. `all` discards all changes. `tracked` discards only tracked files. `prompt` shows a prompt dialog every time the action is run.
extensions/git.config.decorations.enable: Điều khiển whether Git contributes colors và badges đến the Explorer và the Open Editors view.
extensions/git.config.enableStatusBarSyn: Điều khiển whether the Git Sync lệnh appears trong the thanh trạng thái.
extensions/git.config.followTagsWhenSync: Push all annotated tags khi running the sync lệnh.
extensions/git.config.replaceTagsWhenPul: Tự độngally replace the local tags với the remote tags trong case of a conflict khi running the pull lệnh.
extensions/git.config.promptToSaveFilesB: Điều khiển whether Git should check cho unsaved files before stashing changes.
Check only cho unsaved staged files.
Điều khiển whether Git should check cho unsaved files before committing.
Check only cho unsaved staged files.
extensions/git.config.postCommitCommand: Run a git lệnh after a successful commit.

extensions/git.config.rememberPostCommit: Remember the last git lệnh that ran after a commit.
extensions/git.config.openAfterClone: Điều khiển whether đến open a repository tự độngally after cloning.
extensions/git.config.openAfterClone.alw: Always open trong a new window.
extensions/git.config.openAfterClone.whe: Only open trong current window khi no folder is opened.
extensions/git.config.showInlineOpenFile: Điều khiển whether đến show an inline Open file action trong the Git changes view.
extensions/git.config.showPushSuccessNot: Điều khiển whether đến show a thông báo khi a push is successful.
extensions/git.config.inputValidation: Điều khiển whether đến show commit thông điệp input kiểm tra tính hợp lệ diagnostics.
extensions/git.config.inputValidationLen: Điều khiển the commit thông điệp length threshold cho showing a cảnh báo.
extensions/git.config.inputValidationSub: Điều khiển the commit thông điệp subject length threshold cho showing a cảnh báo. Unset it đến inherit the giá trị of `#git.inputkiểm tra tính hợp lệLength#`.
extensions/git.config.detectSubmodules: Điều khiển whether đến tự độngally detect Git submodules.
extensions/git.config.detectSubmodulesLi: Điều khiển the limit of Git submodules detected.
extensions/git.config.detectWorktrees: Điều khiển whether đến tự độngally detect Git worktrees.
extensions/git.config.detectWorktreesLim: Điều khiển the limit of Git worktrees detected.
extensions/git.config.alwaysShowStagedCh: Always show the Staged Changes resource group.
extensions/git.config.alwaysSignOff: Điều khiển the signoff flag cho all commits.
extensions/git.config.ignoreSubmodules: Ignore modifications đến submodules trong the file tree.
extensions/git.config.ignoredRepositorie: List of Git repositories đến ignore.
extensions/git.config.scanRepositories: List of đường dẫns đến search cho Git repositories in.

extensions/git.config.confirmEmptyCommit: Always confirm the creation of empty commits cho the 'Git: Commit Empty' lệnh.
extensions/git.config.fetchOnPull: When đã bật, fetch all branches khi pulling. Otherwise, fetch just the current one.
extensions/git.config.pullBeforeCheckout: Điều khiển whether a branch that does not have outgoing commits is fast-forwarded before it is checked out.
extensions/git.config.autoStash: Stash any changes before pulling và restore them after successful pull.
extensions/git.config.allowForcePush: Điều khiển whether force push (with hoặc without lease) is đã bật.
extensions/git.config.useForcePushWithLe: Điều khiển whether force pushing uses the safer force-with-lease variant.
extensions/git.config.useForcePushIfIncl: Điều khiển whether force pushing uses the safer force-if-includes variant. Note: This cài đặt requires the `#git.useForcePushWithLease#` cài đặt đến be đã bật, và Git version `2.30.0` hoặc later.
extensions/git.config.confirmForcePush: Điều khiển whether đến ask cho confirmation before force-pushing.
extensions/git.config.allowNoVerifyCommi: Điều khiển whether commits without running pre-commit và commit-msg hooks are allowed.
extensions/git.config.confirmNoVerifyCom: Điều khiển whether đến ask cho confirmation before committing without verification.
extensions/git.config.closeDiffOnOperati: Điều khiển whether the diff editor should be tự độngally closed khi changes are stashed, committed, discarded, staged, hoặc unstaged.
extensions/git.config.openDiffOnClick: Điều khiển whether the diff editor should be opened khi clicking a change. Otherwise the regular editor will be opened.
extensions/git.config.supportCancellatio: Điều khiển whether a thông báo comes up khi running the Sync action, which cho phép the user đến cancel the operation.
extensions/git.config.branchSortOrder: Điều khiển the sort order cho branches.
extensions/git.config.untrackedChanges: Điều khiển how untracked changes behave.
extensions/git.config.untrackedChanges.m: All changes, tracked và untracked, appear together và behave equally.
extensions/git.config.untrackedChanges.s: Untracked changes appear separately trong the Source Control view. They are also excluded từ several actions.
extensions/git.config.untrackedChanges.h: Untracked changes are hidden và excluded từ several actions.
extensions/git.config.requireGitUserConf: Điều khiển whether đến require explicit Git user cấu hình hoặc allow Git đến guess nếu missing.
extensions/git.config.showCommitInput: Điều khiển whether đến show the commit input trong the Git source control bảng điều khiển.
extensions/git.config.terminalAuthentica: Điều khiển whether đến enable VS Code đến be the authentication handler cho Git processes spawned trong the Integrated Terminal. Note: Terminals need đến be restarted đến pick up a change trong this cài đặt.
extensions/git.config.terminalGitEditor: Điều khiển whether đến enable VS Code đến be the Git editor cho Git processes spawned trong the integrated terminal. Note: Terminals need đến be restarted đến pick up a change trong this cài đặt.
extensions/git.config.timeline.showAutho: Điều khiển whether đến show the commit author trong the Timeline view.
extensions/git.config.timeline.showUncom: Điều khiển whether đến show uncommitted changes trong the Timeline view.
extensions/git.config.timeline.date: Điều khiển which date đến use cho items trong the Timeline view.
extensions/git.config.useCommitInputAsSt: Điều khiển whether đến use the thông điệp từ the commit input box as the mặc định stash thông điệp.
extensions/git.config.showActionButton: Điều khiển whether an action button is shown trong the Source Control view.
extensions/git.config.showActionButton.c: Show an action button đến commit changes khi the local branch has modified files ready đến be committed.
extensions/git.config.showActionButton.p: Show an action button đến publish the local branch khi it does not have a tracking remote branch.
extensions/git.config.showActionButton.s: Show an action button đến synchronize changes khi the local branch is either ahead hoặc behind the remote branch.
extensions/git.config.statusLimit: Điều khiển how đến limit the số lượng changes that can be parsed từ Git status lệnh. Can be set đến 0 cho no limit.
extensions/git.config.experimental.insta: Thử nghiệm improvements cho the Git setup flow.
extensions/git.config.repositoryScanIgno: List of folders that are ignored while scanning cho Git repositories khi `#git.autoRepositoryDetection#` is set đến `true` hoặc `subFolders`.
extensions/git.config.repositoryScanMaxD: Điều khiển the depth used khi scanning workspace folders cho Git repositories khi `#git.autoRepositoryDetection#` is set đến `true` hoặc `subFolders`. Can be set đến `-1` cho no limit.
extensions/git.config.useIntegratedAskPa: Điều khiển whether GIT_ASKPASS should be overwritten đến use the integrated version.
extensions/git.config.mergeEditor: Open the merge editor cho files that are currently under conflict.
extensions/git.config.optimisticUpdate: Điều khiển whether đến optimistically update the state of the Source Control view after running git lệnhs.
extensions/git.config.openRepositoryInPa: Control whether a repository trong parent folders of workspaces hoặc open files should be opened.
Always open a repository trong parent folders of workspaces hoặc open files.
Never open a repository trong parent folders of workspaces hoặc open files.
Nhắc nhở before opening a repository the parent folders of workspaces hoặc open files.
extensions/git.config.publishBeforeConti: Điều khiển whether đến publish unpublished Git state khi using Continue Working trên từ a Git repository.
Always publish unpublished Git state khi using Continue Working trên từ a Git repository
Never publish unpublished Git state khi using Continue Working trên từ a Git repository
Nhắc nhở đến publish unpublished Git state khi using Continue Working trên từ a Git repository
extensions/git.config.similarityThreshol: Controls the threshold of the similarity index (the amount of additions/deletions compared to the file's size) for changes in a pair of added/deleted files to be considered a rename. **Note:** Requires Git version `2.18.0` or later.
extensions/git.config.blameEditorDecorat: Điều khiển whether đến show blame information trong the editor using editor decorations.

Template for the blame information editor decoration. Supported variables: * `hash`: Commit hash * `hashShort`: First N characters of the commit hash according to `#git.commitShortHashLength#` * `subject`: First line of the commit message * `authorName`: Author name * `authorEmail`: Author email * `authorDate`: Author date * `authorDateAgo`: Time difference between now and the author date
extensions/git.config.blameStatusBarItem: Điều khiển whether đến show blame information trong the thanh trạng thái.

Template for the blame information status bar item. Supported variables: * `hash`: Commit hash * `hashShort`: First N characters of the commit hash according to `#git.commitShortHashLength#` * `subject`: First line of the commit message * `authorName`: Author name * `authorEmail`: Author email * `authorDate`: Author date * `authorDateAgo`: Time difference between now and the author date
extensions/git.config.commitShortHashLen: Điều khiển the length of the commit short hash.
extensions/git.config.diagnosticsCommitH: Điều khiển whether đến check cho unresolved diagnostics before committing.

Controls the list of sources (**Item**) and the minimum severity (**Value**) to be considered before committing. **Note:** To ignore diagnostics from a particular source, add the source to the list and set the minimum severity to `none`.
extensions/git.config.discardUntrackedCh: Controls whether discarding untracked changes moves the file(s) to the Recycle Bin (Windows), Trash (macOS, Linux) instead of deleting them permanently. **Note:** This setting has no effect when connected to a remote or when running in Linux as a snap package.
extensions/git.config.showReferenceDetai: Điều khiển whether đến show the details of the last commit cho Git refs trong the checkout, branch, và tag pickers.
extensions/git.colors.stageModified: Color cho modified resources which have been staged.
extensions/git.colors.stageDeleted: Color cho deleted resources which have been staged.
extensions/git.colors.renamed: Color cho renamed hoặc copied resources.
extensions/git.colors.blameEditorDecorat: Color cho the blame editor decoration.

The URI for your GHE.com or GitHub Enterprise Server instance. Examples: * GHE.com: `https://octocat.ghe.com` * GitHub Enterprise Server: `https://github.octocat.com` > **Note:** This should _not_ be set to a GitHub.com URI. If your account exists on GitHub.com or is a GitHub Enterprise Managed User, you do not need any additional configuration and can simply log in to GitHub.

When true, uses Electron's built-in fetch function cho HTTP requests. khi false, uses the Node.js global fetch function. This cài đặt only applies khi running trong the Electron environment. **Note:** A restart is bắt buộc cho this cài đặt đến take effect.

When true, prioritize the device code flow cho authentication instead of other available flows. This is useful cho environments like WSL where the local server hoặc URL handler flows may not work as expected.
extensions/go.description: Cung cấp làm nổi cú pháp và khớp ngoặc trong Go files.
extensions/groovy.description: Cung cấp snippets, làm nổi cú pháp và khớp ngoặc trong Groovy files.
extensions/grunt.description: Extension đến add Grunt capabilities đến VS Code.
extensions/grunt.config.grunt.autoDetect: Điều khiển enablement of Grunt task detection. Grunt task detection can cause files trong any open workspace đến be executed.
extensions/grunt.grunt.taskDefinition.ty: The Grunt task đến tùy chỉnhize.
extensions/grunt.grunt.taskDefinition.ar: Lệnh line đối sốs đến pass đến the grunt task
extensions/grunt.grunt.taskDefinition.fi: The Grunt file that cung cấp the task. Can be omitted.
extensions/gulp.description: Extension đến add Gulp capabilities đến VSCode.
extensions/gulp.config.gulp.autoDetect: Điều khiển enablement of Gulp task detection. Gulp task detection can cause files trong any open workspace đến be executed.
extensions/gulp.gulp.taskDefinition.type: The Gulp task đến tùy chỉnhize.
extensions/gulp.gulp.taskDefinition.file: The Gulp file that cung cấp the task. Can be omitted.
extensions/handlebars.description: Cung cấp làm nổi cú pháp và khớp ngoặc trong Handlebars files.
extensions/hlsl.description: Cung cấp làm nổi cú pháp và khớp ngoặc trong HLSL files.
extensions/html.description: Cung cấp làm nổi cú pháp, khớp ngoặc & snippets trong HTML files.
extensions/html-language-features.descri: Cung cấp rich language support cho HTML và Handlebar files
extensions/html-language-features.html.c: A list of relative file paths pointing to JSON files following the [custom data format](https://github.com/microsoft/vscode-html-languageservice/blob/master/docs/customData.md). VS Code loads custom data on startup to enhance its HTML support for the custom HTML tags, attributes and attribute values you specify in the JSON files. The file paths are relative to workspace and only workspace folder settings are considered.
extensions/html-language-features.html.f: Enable/disable mặc định HTML formatter.
Maximum amount of characters per line (0 = disable).
List of tags, comma separated, that shouldn't be reformatted. `null` defaults to all tags listed at https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/dom.html#phrasing-content.
List of tags, comma separated, where the content shouldn't be reformatted. `null` mặc địnhs đến the `pre` tag.
Indent `<head>` và `<body>` sections.
Điều khiển whether existing line breaks before elements should be preserved. Only works before elements, not inside tags hoặc cho text.
Maximum số lượng line breaks đến be preserved trong one chunk. Use `null` cho unlimited.
Format and indent `{{#foo}}` and `{{/foo}}`.
List of tags, comma separated, that should have an extra newline before them. `null` mặc địnhs đến `"head, body, /html"`.
Wrap attributes.
Wrap attributes only khi line length is exceeded.
Wrap each attribute except first.
Wrap each attribute except first và keep aligned.
Wrap each attribute.
Wrap khi line length is exceeded, align attributes vertically.
Preserve wrapping of attributes.
Preserve wrapping of attributes but align.
Honor django, erb, handlebars và php templating language tags.
Keep text content together between this string.
Indent wrapped attributes đến after N characters. Use `null` đến use the mặc định indent size. Ignored nếu `#html.format.wrapAttributes#` is set đến `aligned`.
extensions/html-language-features.html.s: Điều khiển whether the built-in HTML language support suggests HTML5 tags, thuộc tính và giá trịs.
Điều khiển whether the built-in HTML language support suggests closing tags. khi đã tắt, end tag hoàn thànhs like `` will not be shown.
extensions/html-language-features.html.t: Traces the communication between VS Code và the HTML language server.
extensions/html-language-features.html.v: Điều khiển whether the built-in HTML language support kiểm tra tính hợp lệ embedded scripts.
Điều khiển whether the built-in HTML language support kiểm tra tính hợp lệ embedded styles.
extensions/html-language-features.html.a: Enable/disable auto creation of quotes cho HTML attribute assignment. The type of quotes can be configured bởi `#html.hoàn thành.attributemặc địnhgiá trị#`.
extensions/html-language-features.html.c: Điều khiển the mặc định giá trị cho attributes khi hoàn thành is accepted.
Attribute giá trị is set đến "".
Attribute giá trị is set đến ''.
Attribute giá trị is not set.
extensions/html-language-features.html.m: Enable/disable mirroring cursor trên matching HTML tag.
Đã lỗi thời trong favor of `editor.linkedEditing`
extensions/html-language-features.html.h: Show tag và attribute documentation trong đỗ chuột.
Show references đến MDN trong đỗ chuột.
extensions/ini.description: Cung cấp làm nổi cú pháp và khớp ngoặc trong Ini files.
extensions/ipynb.description: Cung cấp basic support cho opening và reading Jupyter's.ipynb notebook files
extensions/ipynb.ipynb.pasteImagesAsAtta: Enable/disable pasting of images into Markdown cells trong ipynb notebook files. Pasted images are inserted as attachments đến the cell.
extensions/ipynb.ipynb.experimental.seri: Thử nghiệm feature đến serialize the Jupyter notebook trong a worker thread.

extensions/markdown-language-features.co.message:
Configures the path and file name of files created by copy/paste or drag and drop. This is a map of globs that match against a Markdown document path to the destination path where the new file should be created.

The destination path may use the following variables:

- `${documentDirName}` — Absolute parent directory path of the Markdown document, e.g. `/Users/me/myProject/docs`.
- `${documentRelativeDirName}` — Relative parent directory path of the Markdown document, e.g. `docs`. This is the same as `${documentDirName}` if the file is not part of a workspace.
- `${documentFileName}` — The full filename of the Markdown document, e.g. `README.md`.
- `${documentBaseName}` — The basename of the Markdown document, e.g. `README`.
- `${documentExtName}` — The extension of the Markdown document, e.g. `md`.
- `${documentFilePath}` — Absolute path of the Markdown document, e.g. `/Users/me/myProject/docs/README.md`.
- `${documentRelativeFilePath}` — Relative path of the Markdown document, e.g. `docs/README.md`. This is the same as `${documentFilePath}` if the file is not part of a workspace.
- `${documentWorkspaceFolder}` — The workspace folder for the Markdown document, e.g. `/Users/me/myProject`. This is the same as `${documentDirName}` if the file is not part of a workspace.
- `${fileName}` — The file name of the dropped file, e.g. `image.png`.
- `${fileExtName}` — The extension of the dropped file, e.g. `png`.
- `${unixTime}` — The current Unix timestamp in milliseconds.
- `${isoTime}` — The current time in ISO 8601 format, e.g. '2025-06-06T08:40:32.123Z'.
comment: This setting is use the user drops or pastes image data into the editor. In this case, VS Code automatically creates a new image file in the workspace containing the dropped/pasted image.
It's easier to explain this setting with an example. For example, let's say the setting value was:
{ 'docs/*.md': '${documentDirName}/images/${fileName}' }
Here the setting is an object mapping from a set of globs to a set of file destinations.

The left hand side ('docs/*.md') is a glob that matches against a markdown document. If the glob, matches then we use the right hand side to compute the new file's path and name. The right hand side can also use the special variables document in this setting description.

If a file với the same name already exists, overwrite it.

For existing đường dẫns, try đến maintain the file extension style. cho new đường dẫns, add file extensions.
Prefer including the file extension. cho example, đường dẫn hoàn thànhs đến a file named `file.md` will insert `file.md`.
Prefer removing the file extension. cho example, đường dẫn hoàn thànhs đến a file named `file.md` will insert `file` without the `.md`.

Snippet used when adding videos to Markdown. This snippet can use the following variables: - `${src}` — The resolved path of the video file. - `${title}` — The title used for the video. A snippet placeholder will automatically be created for this variable.

Snippet used when adding audio to Markdown. This snippet can use the following variables: - `${src}` — The resolved path of the audio file. - `${title}` — The title used for the audio. A snippet placeholder will automatically be created for this variable.

Specifies the folder path to the tsserver and `lib*.d.ts` files under a TypeScript install to use for IntelliSense, for example: `./node_modules/typescript/lib`. - When specified as a user setting, the TypeScript version from `typescript.tsdk` automatically replaces the built-in TypeScript version. - When specified as a workspace setting, `typescript.tsdk` allows you to switch to use that workspace version of TypeScript for IntelliSense with the `TypeScript: Select TypeScript version` command. See the [TypeScript documentation](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/typescript/typescript-compiling#_using-newer-typescript-versions) for more detail about managing TypeScript versions.

Get started với JavaScript và Node.js
Make the most of Visual Studio Code's first-class JavaScript experience.
Install Node.js

Node.js is an easy way to run JavaScript code. You can use it to quickly build command-line apps and servers. It also comes with npm, a package manager which makes reusing and sharing JavaScript code easy. [Install Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/download/)
Install Node.js

Node.js is an easy way to run JavaScript code. You can use it to quickly build command-line apps and servers. It also comes with npm, a package manager which makes reusing and sharing JavaScript code easy. [Install Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/download/package-manager/)
Create a JavaScript file

Let's write our first JavaScript file. We'll have to create a new file and save it with the ``.js`` extension at the end of the file name. [Create a JavaScript File](command:javascript-walkthrough.commands.createJsFile)
Run và Debug your JavaScript

Once you've installed Node.js, you can run JavaScript programs at a terminal by entering ``node your-file-name.js`` Another easy way to run Node.js programs is by using VS Code's debugger which lets you run your code, pause at different points, and help you understand what's going on step-by-step. [Start Debugging](command:javascript-walkthrough.commands.debugJsFile)
Debug và run your JavaScript code trong Node.js với Visual Studio Code.
Explore More

Want to get more comfortable with JavaScript, Node.js, and VS Code? Be sure to check out our docs! We've got lots of resources for learning [JavaScript](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/nodejs/working-with-javascript) and [Node.js](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/nodejs/nodejs-tutorial). [Learn More](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/nodejs/nodejs-tutorial)
Learn more about JavaScript và Node.js trong Visual Studio Code.
